{"id":1230015022,"question_id":2869,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1712892645,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1230015022/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Non-decreasing Subarray From Two Arrays","memory":"61.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxNonDecreasingLength(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {\n        int n = nums1.length;\n\n        int dp1 = 1, dp2 = 1;\n\n        int a,b,c,d;\n        int max = 1; \n\n        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){\n            a = nums1[i]>=nums1[i-1]?dp1+1:1;\n            b = nums1[i]>=nums2[i-1]?dp2+1:1;\n\n            c = nums2[i]>=nums2[i-1]?dp2+1:1;\n            d = nums2[i]>=nums1[i-1]?dp1+1:1;\n\n            dp1 = Math.max(a,b);\n            dp2 = Math.max(c,d);\n            max = Math.max(max, Math.max(dp1, dp2));\n        } \n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-non-decreasing-subarray-from-two-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
